original_title: หอแต๋วแตก แหวกชิมิ
overview: After three drag queens sibling have succeeded in freeing the ghost of an ancient lady in the previous sequel, they become famous and are now asked to run a haunted all-male apartment. More ghosts are waiting for these fun-loving katoeys and their cohort of amusing sidekicks.
tagline: They all return in a new haunted place.
title: Oh My Ghost 2
